author: wn.com
title: Latest update Released: 22h50, 22 October 2015 (University of Cape Town)
text: ( Source : University of Cape Town ) Students gathered on campus, and were joined by UCT academics, for a mass gathering on Jammie Plaza . The Academics Union and the Black Academics Caucus hosted a meeting of about 200 concerned academics
